title: The Tree. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Dimension Films, Edward Schuman and Michael Ahnemann
brief_description: This film describes the beauty of trees and their importance to birds, insects, other plants, animals and people. It introduces the interdependence of living things. Suitable for upper primary level.
